metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9798 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In BlueZ 5.42, a use-after-free was identified in "conf_opt" function in "tools/parser/l2cap.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in hcidump crash.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-02-07, appears unfixed crash in hcidump command line tool only

criterions.comment: bluez package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
